lead_paragraph: McQUEENY--John M.,on January 25, 2016. Beloved husband of Madelon. Loving father of John (Winn), Michael and Paul (Carrie). Grandfather of Jane and Liam. Visitation Thursday 2-4 and 7-9pm at Fairchild Sons Funeral Home, Inc., 1201 Franklin Avenue, Garden City, NY. Mass Friday 10am at Joseph's R.C.C., Garden City, NY. Interment at Gate of Heaven Cemetery, Hawthorne, NY. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to Holy Cross College, in memo please note "Athletic Fund." 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MCQUEENY, JOHN M.
